text: Ate yada karo, jadom tusi kiha ki asim ika hi prakara de khane te kade sabara nahim kara sakade. Apane raba nu sade la'i pukaro ki uha sade la'i saga, kakari, kanaka masura ate pi'aza painda kare jo dharati vica ugada hai. Musa ne kiha, ki tusim ika utama vasatu de badale ika mamuli ciza laina cahude ho. Kise sahira vica utarom tam tuhanu uha cizam milanagi'am, jihari'am tusim magade ho. Ate unham upara apamana te kagali pa diti ga'i. Ate uha alaha de krodha de bhagi ho ga'e. Iha isa la'i ho'i'a ki uha alaha di'am nisani'am nu jhuthala'unde sana ate paigabaram di binam kise karana hati'a karade sana. Iha isa la'i vi ki unham ne avagi'a kiti ate uha hada tom vadhana vale sana
